channel.title: ASPROJECT || Unique Content
channel.description:
[center][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/as2%20pictures/as.png[/img]
[b]Client[/b] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/webclient/client.jar]Click here[/url] [b]Forums[/b] [url=http://ancientscapepk.smfforfree3.com/index.php?action=forum]Click here[/url]
[center][b]Features![/b] -Major updates frequently -Ironman mode -Deadman mode -Great membership benefits -Completionist (with colour changing) and max cape -Tutorial island (Can be skipped) -Quests -Duel arena -Nightmare Zone -Level points -Factions -Prestiging -Amazing pking -Buy 100, sell 100 -All skills are trainable even with a new custom dungeon skill -Pk points and pk point store. -Titles -Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks! -Gold scrolls -Craftable high-tier armor/weapons -Single players dungeons / 20+ man raids -Money vault -Achievements with even an achievement cape! -Bosses with unique attacks and special features -Boss slayer tasks and more! -Daily quests to complete [/center]
[b]Pictures[/b]
[center]20+ player raids[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/raid.png[/img]
[center]Single player dungeons[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/dungeons.png[/img]
[center]Raid bosses - was still finishing when recorded[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/raid2.gif[/img]
[center]World events - spawn a random time while server is on, restarting server will get rid of it[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/world%20event.png[/img]
[center]Completionist cape with fully working custom colours[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/completionist%20color.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/comp%20cape.gif[/img]
[center]Achievements[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/tasks.png[/img]
[center]Full working quests - MORE TO COME[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/quests.png[/img]
[center]Client[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/client.png[/img]
[center]Middle mouse button camera movement, click compass to face north, zoom in/out[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/tools.gif[/img]
[center]Tab to reply[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/tab.gif[/img]
[center]Choose your game mode![/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/choose%20your%20mode.png[/img]
[center]Ironman get there very own weapons which then can be upgraded![/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/ironman%20weapons.png[/img]
[center]Deadman mode allows you to PK anyone, anywhere, at anytime![/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/deadman.png[/img]
[center]Choose your faction to help you along the way! (Cannot change once chose)[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/factions.png[/img]
[center]Tutorial island - Can be skipped[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/tutorial.png[/img]
[center]Completionist/max cape rack[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/completion%20cape%20rack.png[/img]
[center]In game high-scores![/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/ingame%20highscores.png[/img]
[center]Titles[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/titles.png[/img]
[center]Membership information/benefits[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/mem%20benefits.png[/img]
[center]View your time played and other information[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/accountinfo.png[/img]
[center]Money vault[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/money%20vault.png[/img]
[center]Simple quest tab[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/questtab2.png[/img]
[center]Pking store[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/pking%20store.png[/img]
[center]If you need that glory or fury, get that crafting and magic up, fully working enchanting and crafting[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/craft.gif[/img]
[center]Fishing - Including rocktails[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/rocktails.png[/img]
[center]Woodcutting 100%[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/woodcutting.png[/img]
[center]Prestige-guide[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/prestige.png[/img]
[center]Storm of armadyl even with the increased speed when using armadyl battlestaff[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/stormofarmadyl.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/storm%20of%20arma.gif[/img]
[center]Craftable legendary weapons - this is a show off of the legendary staff's inbuilt spells[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/trident%20spells.gif[/img]
[center]Chaotic degrading/fixing[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/degrading.gif[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/chaoticfix.gif[/img]
[center]PvP[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/pvp.png[/img]
[center]Nightmare Zone[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/nightmare.png[/img]
[center]Bosses with custom mechanics[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/glacors.png[/img]
[center]Shops[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/shops.png[/img]
[center]Gold scrolls[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/scrolls.png[/img][/center]

item.title: ASPROJECT || Unique Content
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

If the cape recolouring is done properly, you shouldn’t just limit them to the amount of colours you have available. There is a whole palette you can use. Raids look pretty cool, haven’t seen that on a rsps before

Good luck with the server!

Read full topic

item.title: ASPROJECT || Unique Content
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Looks very good and seems the content would be enjoy-able as well.
Goodluck with the server, with the right people around it could definitely become a success.

Read full topic
